typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MATNR as string,
		MTART as string,
		NORMT as string,
		GEWEI as string,
		VOLUM as decimal(10,0),
		VOLEH as string,
		RAUBE as string,
		ETIFO as string,
		EAN11 as string,
		LAENG as decimal(10,0),
		BREIT as decimal(10,0),
		HOEHE as decimal(10,0),
		MEABM as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MARA
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MAKT
MAKT, MARA join(MAKT@MATNR == MARA@MATNR,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> jnrMARA
jnrMARA sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ItemSku as any,
		ItemName as any,
		ItemDescription as any,
		InformationLabelText as any,
		DescriptiveLabelText as any,
		WarningInformationText as any,
		GradeLabelText as any,
		UniversalProductCode as any,
		EuropeanArticleNumber as any,
		GlobalTradeItemNumber as any,
		ItemElectronicProductCode as any,
		ComponentPartIdentifier as any,
		PluCode as any,
		EngineeringReferenceNumber as any,
		CopyrightNumber as any,
		UlControlNumber as any,
		UlFileNumber as any,
		ItemNote as any,
		ProductId as any,
		AssetIndicator as any,
		ItemLength as any,
		ItemWidth as any,
		ItemHeight as any,
		LwhUomId as any,
		ItemVolume as any,
		ItemVolumeUomId as any,
		ItemWeight as any,
		WeightUomId as any,
		ShelfLifeDays as any,
		MinimumStorageTemperature as any,
		MinimumStorageTemperatureUomId as any,
		MaximumStorageTemperature as any,
		MaximumStorageTemperatureUomId as any,
		MinimumStorageHumidity as any,
		MinimumStorageHumidityUomId as any,
		MaximumStorageHumidity as any,
		MaximumStorageHumidityUomId as any,
		StandardQuantityUnitOfMeasureId as any,
		StandardCost as any,
		ListPrice as any,
		StandardWholesalePrice as any,
		TargetReturnPrice as any,
		MarginAmount as any,
		VerbalBidsRequiredForMinimumAmountRange as any,
		VerbalBidsRequiredForMaximumAmountRange as any,
		WrittenBidsRequiredForMinimumAmountRange as any,
		WrittenBidsRequiredForMaximumAmountRange as any,
		CompetitiveBidsRequiredForMinimumAmountRange as any,
		CompetitiveBidsRequiredForMaximumAmountRange as any,
		LotSizeQuantity as any,
		MinimumOrderQuantity as any,
		MinimumStockQuantity as any,
		ActiveItemInventoryPeriodNumberOfDays as any,
		PutAwayRulesStatement as any,
		EurobrandIndicator as any,
		StoreMixedIndicator as any,
		StoreToExistingItemIndicator as any,
		StoreToExistingLotIndicator as any,
		SoleSourceItemIndicator as any,
		SoleSourceSupplierName as any,
		LifedItemIndicator as any,
		InStockOutOfStockIndicator as any,
		HazardousMaterialIndicator as any,
		ActiveInventoryItemIndicator as any,
		EligibleForExportIndicator as any,
		CoManagedInventoryItemIndicator as any,
		RotableItemIndicator as any,
		ConsignmentItemIndicator as any,
		SerializedItemIndicator as any,
		TrackSerialNumberIndicator as any,
		RepairableItemIndicator as any,
		RepairPeriod as any,
		ItemIdentificationMethodId as any,
		CommodityTypeId as any,
		ItemSafetyClassificationId as any,
		StandardStorageUnitTypeId as any,
		SecurityLevelId as any,
		VendorId as any,
		FamilyGroupId as any,
		HazardSeverityCategoryId as any,
		DepreciationMethodId as any,
		ItemTypeId as any,
		BarCodeId as any
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ItemSku = MARA@MATNR,
		ItemDescription = NORMT,
		InformationLabelText = ETIFO,
		GlobalTradeItemNumber = EAN11,
		ItemLength = LAENG,
		ItemWidth = BREIT,
		ItemHeight = HOEHE,
		LwhUomId = MEABM,
		ItemVolume = VOLUM,
		ItemVolumeUomId = VOLEH,
		WeightUomId = GEWEI,
		StandardStorageUnitTypeId = RAUBE,
		ItemTypeId = MTART
	)) ~> Item
